House Bill/Resolution NO. HB01909
FULL TITLE : AN ACT AMENDING SECTIONS 4, 5, 20, 22, 25, 27, 28, 34, 40, 50, 73, 112, 117, 119, 203, 204, 222, 237, 237-A, 255, 256, 257, 258, 260, 261, 262, 263, 264, 265, 266, 275, 282, 290 AND ADDING SECTIONS 6-A AND A NEW TITLE XIII UNDER THE NATIONAL INTERNAL REVENUE CODE OF 1997, AS AMENDED, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
ABSTRACT : Seeks to lower the corporate tax rate through rationalizing the administration of tax incentives which shall be performance-based, target, time-bound and transparent. Aims to widen the corporate tax base and plug its tax leakages; and to rationalize and discipline tax incentives to ensure the benefits investments would bring and help alleviate financial burden on the business community, especially the micro, small, and medium-sized enterprises.
